name: European Association of Real Estate Professions
goal: The objective of the organisation is to be the main point of reference and convergence for European real estate professionals. It also contributes to the structure and develoment of European cross-border services and transactions of a mainly residential nature.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Taxation
euInitiatives:
Services Package
Directive on the Recognition of Professional Qualifications
Energy Performance of Buildings Directive
Energy Efficiency Directive
Anti-Money Laundering
Resource Efficiency
Data Protection
